nodes.text: The Khramboans were a sentient species from the Khramboa system. Droogan and his grandfather were both members of this species.

The Khramboans were a blue-colored species marked by a bipedal stature and had two three-fingered arms, two eyes on horizontal eyestalks and a mouth hidden behind two thick face-tentacles, similar to the Quarren.
The Khramboans evolved in the Khramboa system in the Core Worlds region. Some Khramboans, like Droogan, lived on Coruscant.
